subtitle: you have memories you have stories to
tell so you have lived in the
past we don't usually remember what has
passed so we say that there is no past
if we are focused on the present there
is no past the present for us is the
result of the past of everything we have
already built from our journey but there
is nothing to remember what is past is
past it is not part of the present
experienced of sadness or Joy has been
added to my soul and in this present I
know exactly every point where I
experienced it it is as if I look at a
big panel and know every great movement
of my soul but there is no memory no
reason to dwell on a past moment the
concern is to create the present moment
